taxi.model.Customer

    taxi.model  
    taxi.resource  
    taxi.service

    • Uses of Customer in taxi.service

      Methods in taxi.service that return Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Customer RegistrationService.registerCustomer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String sex, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.util.Date dateOfBirth, double locationLat, double locationLon, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String city, int zipCode, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creditCardType, java.lang.String creditCardNumber, java.lang.String expiryDate, java.lang.String ccv)
      registerCustomer method This method gets as parameters: the name the surname the sex the username the password the dateOfBirth the latitude the longtitude the address the city the zipCode the email the creditCardType the creditCardNumber the expiryDate the ccv The method: Validates username Validates password and then encrypts it Validates email Validates credit card Validates date of birth Creates the new customer object and inserts it in the DB Finally it returns the new object Note: It is assumed that coordinates are fetched from GPS
      Methods in taxi.service with parameters of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean RequestHandlingService.cancelRequest(Customer customer, Request req)
      cancelRequest method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer and the customer object which cancels the request The method: Assumes that customer can only cancel a request he already made and it is not already canceled or done Updates the status of request to CANCELED Informs taxi driver that the request has been canceled
      java.util.List<Taxi> RequestHandlingService.searchTaxi(Customer customer, int range)
      searchTaxi method This method gets as parameters: the customer object and the range in kilometers The method: Creates an empty list of Taxis to store the results of the search Creates a CoordinateCalc object, which will be used to calculate the distance between customer and taxi Fetches from the table Taxi all the taxis which are free (status = true) In case the result set is empty, the list of results has 0 elements Otherwise, the distance between customer and each taxi is calculated.
      Request RequestHandlingService.startRequest(Taxi taxi, Customer customer)
      startRequest method This method gets as parameters: the taxi object selected by the customer for this request and the customer object The method: Uses the current date as the date that the request was made Creates a request with that date, the taxi and the customer and inserts it to the DB Fetches from the table TaxiDriver the taxi driver to whom the given taxi belongs Informs taxi driver for this request The created request is returned
